title: Random In Game FPS Drops following every re-installation of League
body:
My FPS randomly drop in game. Sometimes it seemed to be due to placing wards or when a champion would use an ability but other times, nothing would be happening on my current view and I would still get frame drops. I lose trades and miss abilities due to these random frame drops. My GPU drivers are updated. 

I tried re-downloading league to see if the re-installation would fix the problem. The first time the client was open and I played games, I would get no frame drops. However, all games after I closed and reopened the client, I would get random frame drops. 

I attempted this "fix" twice over a 1 week period and I faced similar results. I would receive 0 frame drops throughout the games where I just opened the client after re-installation. I would receive random frame drops for every game in every subsequent client after the first client.

replies.body: It seems that your game files is rendering the match properly, which would cause you to have fps issues like this.  Sometimes this could be due to corrupt game files, and also outdated drivers.  I understand you have already check these, but we also have an [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide that will provide some additional steps to get your PC tuned up.  Hopefully, this will fit the bill!
